message.content:
cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CY, cs.CC

The paper discusses the technological foundations for smart systems that support humans in their everyday life, which falls under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC). The paper also discusses the concepts of information, knowledge, and experience, which are related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the differentiation of CIL from related fields such as active learning and collaborative learning, which falls under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY) and computational complexity (cs.CC).
